subject: Hockey, Ice
College Athletics
NCAA Ice Hockey Championships
lead_paragraph: Providence will play for the N.C.A.A. championship on Saturday against Boston University, but its 13 losses are the most for a Frozen Four finalist since 2008.
snippet: Providence will play for the N.C.A.A. championship on Saturday against Boston University, but its 13 losses are the most for a Frozen Four finalist since 2008.
